banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: How to activate ideas

nodes.whoTheyAre: Manav Subodh is the global manager for entrepreneurship and innovation in Intel’s Corporate Affairs group. His mission is to collaborate with young innovators, inventors, designers and technology startups in more than 30 countries and provide them with opportunities for technology commercialization, licensing and entrepreneurship.

videoData.description: Great incubators of innovations are not limited to garages in Silicon Valley. Manov Subodh charts three principles for sparking entrepreneurial ventures and ideas in people around the world. From dreaming big to getting over the fear of failure, he offers case studies that guide us through the whole process.
